headline: Here’s Why Oakmark Select Fund Backs Targa Resources (TRGP)
summary: Oakmark Funds, advised by Harris Associates, released its “Oakmark Select Fund” fourth-quarter 2025 investor letter. Oakmark Select Fund is a non-diversified fund that aims to deliver capital appreciation by investing in mid and large-cap US companies. A copy of the letter can be downloaded here. In the quarter, the fund (investor class) outperformed the S&P 500 Index, […]
